name: jwks-provider
description: Serializer of keys for jwks route

scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push origin master --follow-tags
